scripts.build:view:stg: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=stg vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionView --dest dist/aaview src/components/AAView/index.vue
scripts.build:view:production: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionView --dest dist/aaview src/components/AAView/index.vue
scripts.build:list: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionList --dest dist/aalist src/components/AAList/index.vue
scripts.build:list:stg: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=stg vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionList --dest dist/aalist src/components/AAList/index.vue
scripts.build:form:stg: NODE_ENV=stg vue-cli-service build  --mode stg --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionForm --dest dist/aaform src/components/AAForm/index.vue
scripts.build:form: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build --mode production --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionForm --dest dist/aaform src/components/AAForm/index.vue
